text:
Curtains by Ed Sheeran
Once upon a time, I dared a game to conceal myself. 

You might be familiar with this latest single from Ed Sheeran. The first time I heard this song, I was walking from capitol street to my home and it’s 4:33pm in the afternoon. The first few lines caught my attention as I looked up to see the sun shining brightly. 
“ Can you pull the curtains? Let me see the sunshine
I think I'm done with my hidin' place, and you found me anyway” that soothing voice that made me look where the sun was, I felt that.
“It's been forever, but I'm feelin' alright
Tears dry and will leave no trace, and tomorrow's another day” For too long, I've been hiding and seeking my true inner thoughts, and now it seems I've lost my way on the right path, with no footprints to follow. How can I find my way back?

“Hide and seek
I am somewhere closed away
You won't believe
How long it's been since we started the game”
Once upon a time, I dared a game which involves hiding my “self” and appearing as if i were no one, nothing, or even someone else. Every day, I pretend as if I don't feel anything. It's been forever, and I can't seem to find which box contains my self. Nevertheless, I'm feeling alright this is just a matter of talking sense to myself. Yet every single day, I feel like I am no longer who I was before. And everyday, it just gets harder for me to look where I should start searching. I find myself stuck in a stage where I am waiting for the curtains to be pulled.

"Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine” 🎶
If I could describe the state of “my self” right now, I'd say I'm like a nimbus cloud that always brings rain over the beautiful landscape in the heavenly, breathtaking countryside.

“Life can be
So beautiful if you try”
Darkness has consumed my body and my self nowhere to be found. Perhaps, I am a robot who’s supposed not to feel sadness and follow anyone whom I perceive as superior to me. Despite this, I always try to make a memory and make a meaning out of the day that I spent with anyone I encounter in this world. 

"Are you okay?" Yeah, I guess so
But on some days, I feel like I'm trapped in a hole
But I keep quiet, so the ones around me don't know”

Some days, when I look in the mirror, I find myself asking if I truly am this person. Or am I within a different body? Is this my consciousness? Why do our opinions occasionally differ? Nonetheless, I keep these thoughts to myself, fearing that others might perceive me as somewhat losing my mind—even though the truth is that I'm on the brink of flying and leaving this body. 


“That the mountain feels so steep
And I'll say that I'm here to help to carry the load
And the outside rays, they are good for the soul
So let's step out of the dark, 'cause in here, it's so cold
The day's not out of reach and that's when you say to me
"Can you pull the curtains, let me see the sunshine?
I think I'm done with my hidin' place, and you found me anyway
It's been forever, but I'm feelin' alright
Tears dry and will leave no trace, and tomorrow's another day"
Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine, shine, shine
Let me see the sunshine. “

WHERE IS THAT RAY OF SUNSHINE IN ME?

I snapped back to reality and found myself growing angrier listening to this song as I walked through this bustling city. The intense sunshine feels like it's roasting me. Tomorrow is another day, another chance for the sunshine to lead me into contemplation or perhaps the rain will grace us for the next few days. As I walk uphill, I glance back and am completely in awe, noticing the heart of this place. Cebu City is truly a wonder, but which weather suits this city better? Is it rainy or becoming dry?
author: Jancris Bustillo

text:
Dear Ed,
I've been dealing with a painful breakup ,Thank you for releasing this album it's truly a masterpiece. This song describes my ex boyfriend Ian really well he has major anxiety and never really opened up to me and I know deep down we are the perfect match .. this song and others have helped me to release the emotions that I've been hiding . I can't think about moving on just yet my ex means the world to me and I feel like I've lost the love of my life and I'm slowly crumbling to pieces . Your music has brought me strength and helped me over come depression and helped me deal with my learning disability as well. I love you so much!! Thank you for everything 💛. I can't wait to see you on July 1st at Gillette Stadium!!
author: Meghan Ahearn

text: Wow, this man's voice is simply amazing, and every song he creates is just perfect! Ed, I know you may never read this, but I just wanted to express my gratitude for existing and being such an inspiration to us all. Your music, especially this album, has helped me to tap into a range of emotions that I didn't even know existed within me. It's so rare to come across such a flawless masterpiece that allows us to feel and express ourselves so freely. I understand that you've been going through a tough time lately, and as someone who can relate to the lyrics on a personal level, I won't just say that everything will be okay soon. But I truly hope that this difficult journey leads you and all of us to a happier place, where moments of joy can coexist with any sadness we may feel. This album has been like a breath of fresh air for me, keeping me going and giving me hope when everything else seemed bleak. Ed, please never doubt your incredible talent. Year after year, you continue to prove yourself as a gifted magician of music, lyrics, and emotions. Wishing you and your family all the best.🙏🙏🙏🙏

text:
Hello, I'm your old Korean fan.👋
I just wanted to tell you something about this album.
This album is perfect. It makes me feel like back to the past when I listened song "perfect". 

Recently, in my opinion, you made a bright, fast, mechanical song to keep up with the trend. I also liked that. 
But this album seems to be back to your old style, and I love it. I love the melody and lyrics that only you can make, and I love to say everything you want to say through the song. 
When I first listened to this album, it reminded me of 2016 when I heard your song first time, and then I could feel the feeling I felt at the time. Thank you a lot.
There are people who like your bright and fast songs, but there are many people who like your original style, slightly gloomy, calm, and lyrical melodies like me. Because these calm and talking songs are very comfort and soothe tired hearts.💗

Thank you for working hard on this album, and saying your story honestly in the song. 
Please continue to make calm songs that are your own style.
And please come to Korea for a concert. 
Here are a lot of people who love you and your song. We are waiting for you come to Korea.🙏
Lastly, as much as you've had a tough 2022, I hope you'll have a 2023 full of happiness things.
Always be happy and healthy. I'll always cheer for you from a far👍
